Open Association Form
Assosiate tray label RFID EPC with lots

Activity.DisplayName: Read Tray RFID EPC using nearfield antenna
Decode Tray Label 2D matrix from DM152 Camera
Populate Tray Part Number And Lots
Stay in loop until loop count equals datavalues read

WorkflowActivity.Id: Reread Marker
Open chamber locking pin
Confirm Correct Trays in Bag

Activity.Message: Seal ziploc, rubber band the brick, and affix the tamper seal. Place brick in chamber, close and latch the cover, then click CHAMBER READY. Click CANCEL to Exit Loop if there was a problem with the tamper seal.

WorkFlowActivityKeyValuePair.Value: Re-read was approved. WARNING: The area leader is still logged in. The Assembler should log in again on the next screen to continue the process under their User ID.

WorkflowActivity.Id: Check chamber lid switch closed
Close chamber locking pin
Chamber RFID Reading

WorkflowActivity.Id: Print Bag Label

Activity.Message: Get bag label and read RFID. Contact area leader if RFID does not read.

WorkFlowActivityKeyValuePair.Value: Reprint was succesful. WARNING: The area leader is still logged in. The Assembler should log in again on the next screen to continue the process under their User ID.

WorkflowActivity.Id: Associate bag label RFID EPC wtih lot ID's

Activity.DisplayName: Read Bag RFID EPC using nearfield antenna
Decode Bag Label 2D matrix from DM152 Camera
Temporarily Store Part Number And Lots From Bag Label 2D Matrix
Verify Matches 2D Matrix And Drop File

WorkFlowActivityKeyValuePair.Value: Scan the Printed Label 2D matrix. Contact area leader if matrix does not scan.
Please wait while data are verified.
ERROR: The 2D matrix does not read.
ERROR: Number of lots in brick exceeds the max configured number allowed.
If Lot List is needed, click EXPORT.
Bag 2D Matrix does not match Drop File.

WorkflowActivity.Id: Affix bag label and confirm bag label on correct bag

WorkFlowActivityKeyValuePair.Value: Re-read was approved. WARNING: The area leader is still logged in. The Assembler should log in again on the next screen to continue the process under their User ID.

WorkflowActivity.Id: Open chamber locking pin for bag
Affix bag label and confirm bag label on correct bag (part 2)

Activity.DisplayName: Set ReRead Marker To First ReRead

Activity.Message: Remove brick from Chamber and affix label to bag, If bag label was successfully affixed: Return brick to Chamber, close and latch Chamber lid, and click CHAMBER READY to perform second read. If bag label was damaged while affixing to the bag: Cut and dispose of label, and select RE-READ to return to the first chamber read and reprint the label. If bag was damaged while affixing label: Click CANCEL to Exit Loop.
Activity.DisplayName: Wait For ChamberReady Message After Open
Check Authorization To Stop After Print

WorkflowActivity.Id: Check chamber lid switch closed for bag
Close chamber locking pin for bag
Affix bag label and confirm bag label on correct bag (part 3)

Activity.Message: Reading Brick RFID for Bag integrity test

Activity.DisplayName: Read RFIDtTags to check bag integrity 2

Activity.Message: Lid was open at the end of the EPC verification.
Activity.DisplayName: Lid Was Open at the EPC verification

Activity.Message: Bag test passed, reading Brick RFID

WorkFlowActivityKeyValuePair.Value: ERROR: Tray RFID tag was read during Bag Integrity Test: {0}. Contact area leader.

WorkflowActivity.Id: Check chamber lid switch opened for RFID reading on bag
Affix bag label and confirm bag label on correct bag (part 4)

Activity.Message: Lid was open at the end of the EPC verification. Click CANCEL to Exit Loop or RE-READ to try again.
Activity.DisplayName: Lid Was Open at the EPC verification

WorkFlowActivityKeyValuePair.Value: Place brick in chamber, close and latch the cover, then click CHAMBER READY. Click Cancel to Exit Loop if there was a problem with the tamper seal.

WorkflowActivity.Id: Track Lot IDs and Verify Termination
Open chamber locking pin for bag
Track Lot IDs and Verify Termination (part 2)

WorkFlowActivityKeyValuePair.Value: Remove Brick from Chamber and place on Finished Goods Shelf.
